name: ZOMBOCALYPSE: Sidescrolling Action RPG Zombie Game
blurb: Survive the zombie apocalypse! RPG elements, kill streaks, skills, hordes of undead, & killer graphics. Made by indie developers & YOU!

rewards.reward: \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014   RECRUIT   \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\r\n\r\nYou will receive a special digital THANK YOU CARD and a high-resolution WALLPAPER pack by our lead artist and award winning illustrator Mike Puncekar (for your PC, Mac, tablet, and mobile device).

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 SURVIVOR \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014Receive a COPY of Zombocalypse for iOS when the game is released (for U.S. Backers only, please read our FAQ*) and YOUR NAME in a special section of the game's credits as a Backer, as well as on a permanent Kickstarter Founders Wall on the Ironzilla website for being a part of the Zombocalypse movement! [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 PRIVATE \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\r\nReceive a COPY of Zombocalypse for iOS when the game is released (for U.S. Backers only, please read our FAQ*), a promo code for an exclusive in-game weapon: the WAR BLADE, the official digital Zombocalypse SOUNDTRACK ALBUM by Symphony of Specters (the award winning composers who did the amazing soundtracks for Castle Crashers), and YOUR NAME in the game's credits as a Backer, as well as on a permanent Kickstarter Founders Wall on the Ironzilla website for being a part of the Zombocalypse movement! [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 MERCENARY \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nEARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Get all the rewards of the '$40 CAPTAIN Tier' for only $25! This is a Limited Reward so act fast! You'll receive the digital Zombocalypse DEVELOPMENT BOOK (.PDF) packed to the brim with behind the scenes content. If you want to see what goes into developing a game, this is your tier! [Plus receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 CAPTAIN \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\r\nReceive the digital Zombocalypse DEVELOPMENT BOOK (.PDF) packed to the brim with behind the scenes content: the Zombocalypse story, the making of the game, concept art, production art, developer insight, bios, and more top secret info! If you want to see what goes into developing a game, this is your tier! [Plus receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 MAJOR \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nReceive a Zombocalypse T-SHIRT exclusive to Kickstarter Backers - OR - a limited edition 18x24" Zombcalypse POSTER digitally painted by award winning illustrator Mike Puncekar. Plus, become an OFFICIAL BETA TESTER and get a chance to shape the game directly in it's infancy. For shipping outside of the USA, please add $10 to your pledge. [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 COLONEL \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nYou'll receive BOTH the exclusive Zombocalypse T-SHIRT + POSTER, an in game item exclusive to Kickstarter backers: the COMMANDO equippable helmet, and YOUR NAME in the game's credits as well as our Kickstarter Founders Wall as a Notable Contributor! For shipping outside of the USA, please add $10 to your pledge. [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 GENERAL\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nReceive a limited edition high quality piece of art: a gorgeous ZOMBOCALYPSE POSTER on CANVAS, gallery-stretched over a wooden frame, digitally painted and signed by award winning illustrator Mike Puncekar (replaces the normal poster!). It's a piece that looks like it belongs in an art museum. For shipping outside of the USA, please add $20 to your pledge. [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards].

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 COMMANDER \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nWe will immortalize your pretty face as an EQUIPPABLE HEAD in the game along with your name, a promo code to unlock it, and a short two sentence bio that fits the storyline. Now you can see your 2D face cringe from attacks, or in a heroic frenzy when you're gunning down zombies. You will get behind the scenes access, be included in the creative process, provide direct feedback to the team, and more. [Plus you'll receive all previous rewards EXCEPT the normal poster]

\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 LEGEND \u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014\u2014 \r\nWe will immortalize you as one of the integral MAIN CHARACTERS (zombie or hero) in the game with your name and work with you on their back-story.  Now you can call in chopper gunners, kick some zombie ass, and survive the Zombocalypse as yourself! You will be featured in the game's credits as an ASSOCIATE-PRODUCER, and be brought on board the project to directly influence the game. Get behind the scenes access, be included in the creative process, provide direct feedback to the team, and more. You will have the prestigious title of Founding Father on our permanent Kickstarter Founder's Wall on the Ironzilla website. If you are in the San Francisco area, we will personally take you and a friend out to dinner! [Plus all previous rewards, INCLUDING the normal poster]
